Name: damage
Param_Schema: type, amount, scaling, resource, interval, duration, maxJumps, attenuation
Abilities_Using: Acid Breath; Acid Burst; Ancestral Vengeance; Backstab; Baleful Polymorph; Bash; ...
Notes: Consolidated: instant + DoT (interval/duration) + chain (maxJumps/attenuation) + resource drain

Name: heal
Abilities_Using: Bandage; Cure Blind; Cure Critic; Cure Light; Full Heal; Group Heal; Heal; Lay Hands; ...

Name: modify
Abilities_Using: Apocalyptic Anthem; Aria Of Dissonance; Armor; Barkskin; Battle Howl; Bless; ...
Notes: Consolidated: stat_mod + resource_mod + saving_mod + size_mod. Target enum includes all attributes/combat stats/max resources/saves/size.

Name: status
Param_Schema: flag, type, amount, duration, breakOnDamage, contestedBy, source, consumeOnCast
Abilities_Using: Aware; Berserk; Bless; Bind; Blindness; Charm Person; Demonskin; Detect Invisibility; Empower; ...
Notes: Consolidated: simple status + CC + stealth + detection + resistance + vulnerability + reflect + elemental_hands + lifesteal + empowered (next spell buff)

Name: cleanse
Abilities_Using: Remove Curse; Remove Paralysis; Remove Poison; Sane Mind

Name: dispel
Abilities_Using: Dispel Magic; Douse; Enrapture; Extinguish; Peace

Name: reveal
Abilities_Using: Enlightenment; Identify; Know Spell; Locate Object; Reveal Hidden; Wizard Eye

Name: teleport
Abilities_Using: Dimension Door; Group Recall; Group Retreat; Moonwell; Plane Shift; Recall; Relocate; ...

Name: extract
Notes: Replaces complex banish effect. Tiered outcomes handled at ability level.

Name: interrupt
Notes: NEW: Stop spellcasting/channeling. Used by kick/bash/counterspell.

Name: transform
Notes: NEW: References form templates in forms.json

Name: create
Abilities_Using: Armor Of Gaia; Create Food; Create Spring; Create Water; Flame Blade; Minor Creation

Name: summon
Abilities_Using: Animate Dead; Clone; Heavens Gate; Summon Demon; Summon Elemental; ...

Name: enchant
Param_Schema: effect, type, flag, amount, duration, charges
Notes: NEW: Apply effects to objects. Duration=time-based

Name: globe
Notes: Blocks violent spells up to maxCircle. Dispel always bypasses.

Name: room
Param_Schema: subtype, type, duration, damagePerTick, damageOnMovement, hp, traversalRules
Abilities_Using: Control Weather; Darkness; Illumination; Wall Of Fog; Wall Of Ice; Wall Of Stone; ...
